ygData.subject: Mez and stun
ygData.msgSnippet: Does anybody have information about the lengths of the mez and stun lines ? I heard in-game that mez is 15 sec, enthrall 30, entrance 45 and dazzle 60. The
ygData.messageBody:
Does anybody have information about the lengths of the mez and stun lines ?
I heard in-game that mez is 15 sec, enthrall 30, entrance 45 and dazzle 60.
The enchanter spell list on Baelish's site says mez 30, enthrall 30,
entrance 50-60, dazzle 120, which I find more believable. Anybody measure
with a stopwatch ?

Also, as far as I can tell, this line of spells is fixed duration, i.e, MOB
does not get any saving throws to break early like the root line. True ?

Stun line : Color Flux 3 sec, Color Shift 7 sec, Color Skew 8 sec. Is the
stun duration fixed ? In my experience, some MOBs seem to be more susceptible
to staying stunned longer. Like lizards in CT seemed to stay stunned forever
with even flux.

Mohini,
Lvl 27 enchanter on Fenin Ro.
